text.author: Ibaman, Victor LP, Jura1 and others (see URL)
text.title: Phoenix
text.summary: This article describes Phoenix, the hot and dry desert capital of Arizona, with information about its history from the agricultural Native American period to European settlement,as well as about climate, use of Spanish and the terminals at Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport.
